title: Provides for individual, group and health maintenance organization coverage for glycated hemoglobin test for diabetes for up to four times per year
summary: Provides for individual, group and health maintenance organization coverage for glycated hemoglobin test for diabetes for up to four times per year when recommended or prescribed by a physician or other health care provider.
